body:
@bradfitz 

How to let him use only http，Because my github use https prompt invalid TLS certs。
`
[root@php-6-174 ~]# go get 192.168.6.70/golib/goredis
`

> 
package 192.168.6.70/golib/goredis: unrecognized import path "192.168.6.70/golib/goredis" (https fetch: Get https://192.168.6.70/golib/goredis?go-get=1: x509: cannot validate certificate for 192.168.6.70 because it doesn't contain any IP SANs)
>
